required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study Evaluating Pharmacodynamics, Pharmacokinetics, Safety and Tolerability of HSK3486 Single Bolus Dose Followed With a 30 Minute Constant Infusion in Healthy Male Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1 Study to Investigate a Single Bolus Dose Followed With a 30 Minute Constant Infusion of HSK3486 on the Pharmacodynamics, Pharmacokinetics, Safety and Tolerability of HSK3486 in Healthy Male Subjects.

lead_sponsor.agency: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This study was a single center, open-label, single dose escalation study in healthy male subjects to investigate a bolus dose followed by a 30 minute constant infusion of HSK3486 over two cohorts.

primary_outcome.measure: Safety by measurement of Adverse Events
primary_outcome.time_frame: First dose of study drug on day 1

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of study drug until fully alert on day 1
secondary_outcome.description: Observe the change of modified observer's assessment of alert /sedation during the whole trial

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of study drug until fully alert on day 1
From first dose of study drug until fully alert on day 1
From the start of administration to 48 hours after administration
From the start of administration to 48 hours after administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Terminal elimination half life (t1/2z) and mean residence time (MRT)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of administration to 48 hours after administration
From the start of administration to 48 hours after administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Curve (AUC0-30min, AUC0-1h, AUC0-last, and AUC0-inf)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of administration to 48 hours after administration
From the start of administration to 48 hours after administration

arm_group.description: Initially 0.288 mg/kg or 0.540 mg/kg was administered as a 1 minute bolus, followed immediately by a constant infusion dose of 1 mg/kg/h administered as a 30 minute infusion via infusion pump.
